bio:
This man is the resident blacksmith at Fort Pale Pass. He is an Imperial, clean-shaved and short-haired. He sells, weapons and armor (including enchanted ones), as well as smithing supplies. He is also willing to buy used weapons and armor at a discount.
During the day, he can usually be found working at his forge and offering his services. On Middas, he will join in with the rest of the soldiers at the chapel in the Captain's Quarters for the weekly meeting with Legate Varrus.
He wears a blacksmith's apron and shoes. He is armed with an Imperial sword and bow, and a large supply of steel arrows.
name: Imperial Quartermaster
